description:
My place is close to Baby's All Right, Peter Luger Steak House.. one block from Bedford ave and 10min walk to the water..  This location is good for solo adventurers and business travelers. Its near a 24 hour market.. pharmacy and 5 min from the trains M and J.. one stop into manhattan !!! Also 10 min walk to the L train .. its very safe very close to anything cool and fun in Brooklyn. Tons of bars and restaurants minutes away!! First floor.

one bedroom .. one bathroom with shower and tub. 
washer dryer unit inside apartment

One block from the main strip of shopping food and bars on Bedford Ave.
name: Perfect location Williamsburg chic cozy
review: The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
